item.title: Pokemon GO: Best Moveset For Zapdos
item.description:
In Pokemon GO , many different Pokemon are featured through the various Raid rotations as events come and pass in the game. These Raids offer not only an opportunity to go up against these powerful Pokemon, but to capture them and add them to your Pokedex and collection.

Following the capture of Raid Pokemon, many Trainers will then go on to use these new additions in other PvE or PvP battles, so ensuring they can operate with the most efficiency is crucial. Following the presence of Zapdos in 5-Star Raid Battles during June 2024, near the beginning of the new Shared Skies Season, many trainers will be looking to equip the best moveset possible for their new Zapdos. For this reason, a summary of the best Zapdos movesets , including damage output have been identified in this guide.

Best Zapdos Moveset in Pokemon GO

In Pokemon GO , Zapdos is an Electric and Flying Dual-Type Pokemon. This means that Zapdos has weaknesses to both Ice and Rock Type Pokemon or moves, but will be resistant against Bug, Flying, Electric, Grass, Fighting, Ground, and Steel Type Pokemon or moves. Zapdos has a maximum CP of 3,987, a stat spread of 253 ATK, 285 DEF, and 207 STA , and is boosted by Rain and Windy weather.

When equipped with the best possible moves, which has been outlined below, you can expect Zapdos to deal around 16.11 damage per second , and a total damage output of approximately 493.6 before fainting in battle. However, in the case that the best move set for Zapdos is unavailable to you, or you need to tweak the combination slightly to better suit the rest of your team composition or Type coverage, then several additional options with similar damage capabilities have also been referenced below.

Best Zapdos Moveset

  • Fast Move : Thunder Shock
  • Charged Move : Drill Peck

Secondary Zapdos Moveset Options

Fast Move

Charged Move

Damage Per Second

Total Damage

Thunder

13.04

401.8

Thunder Shock is a Legacy Fast Move , meaning that it is only obtainable through special events, or with the use of an Elite Fast TM . For this reason, Thunder Shock may not be available to all players. If you are unable to achieve this move, then the best Zapdos moveset will likely be Charge Beam and Drill Peck, which is identified second on the list of secondary Zapdos moveset options.

item.title: CoD MW3 & Warzone: Best Superi 46 Loadout
item.description:
Quick Links

  • How To Unlock The Superi 46
  • Best MW3 Superi 46 Loadout
  • Best Warzone Superi 46 Loadout

The debut of Modern Warfare 3 and Warzone 's Season 4 sees the arrival of additional maps and modes for both games, allowing players to battle on maps like Tokyo for Multiplayer and dive into wacky playlists like Demolition and Hyper Cranked. Battle Royale also receives unique content, such as changes to the Gulag, an additional vehicle, along with new secrets within the Urzikstan Bunkers. The arguably most exciting change, however, has to be the addition of the Superi 46.

The Superi 46 is Season 4's latest addition to the Submachine Gun category. Boasting impressive handling attributes, along with top-tier recoil control and accuracy, this nifty SMG excels in close-to-medium range engagements. Though not boasting the highest damage output in its category, the Superi 46 is still a solid option for aggressive players. Here is the best loadout for the Superi 46 in both Modern Warfare 3 and Warzone .

How To Unlock The Superi 46

Much like the Kar98k, the Superi 46 is one of the free rewards tied to the Season 4 Battle Pass of Modern Warfare 3 and Warzone . The first step to acquiring the Superi 46 is to create a path to Sector 6 by claiming all rewards in adjacent Sectors with Battle Pass Tokens. The most effective path to Sector 6 is by claiming the rewards in Sectors 1, 2, and 4. Finally, players can then acquire the Superi 46 after claiming all other rewards in Sector 6.

Once Season 4 has come to a close, the Superi 46 will then be made available as an Armory Unlock.

Best MW3 Superi 46 Loadout

The following Superi 46 build is tailored to excel in the close-range meta for Modern Warfare 3 's Multiplayer. With the following attachments, players can expect an increase in handling and mobility, as well as improved accuracy and recoil control. This Submachine Gun build performs perfectly up close but even handles pretty well at medium range, making it among the best weapons available.

  • Colossus Suppressor (Muzzle)
  • XTEN Phantom-5 Handstop (Underbarrel)
  • FSS OLE-V Laser (Laser)
  • 40 Round Mag (Magazine)
  • Rescue-9 Stock (Stock)

Best Equipment

  • Assassin Vest (Vest) - The ideal choice to run alongside a suppressor attachment. Makes players immune to showing up on the minimap via enemy UAVs, along with hiding kill skulls from the enemy team.
  • Scavenger Gloves (Gloves) - Synergises well with SMGs due to their higher fire rate. Allows players to resupply ammunition from ammo packs dropped from eliminated operators.
  • Covert Sneakers (Boots) - Ideal perk for stealth-orientated builds. Allows players to sneak up on unsuspecting enemies by silencing their footstep audio.
  • Bone Conduction Headset (Gear) - Boosts the player's ability to focus on enemy footsteps by reducing player combat and environmental sounds.

Recommended Secondary

The Superi 46 is a solid Primary weapon and will carry many of the gunfights players will find themselves caught up in for Modern Warfare 3 's Multiplayer. With that being the case, players have two main options when it comes to their Secondary slot. The first is to run with a reliable Handgun, and the Renetti , the WSP Stinger , and the TYR will prove to be more than sufficient. The second option is to equip a Launcher like the PILA or the JOKR to lay waste to enemy killstreaks such as UAVs.

Best Warzone Superi 46 Loadout

The following build is made specifically to perform as a great close-range support weapon for Warzone . Running the following attachments leads to improved damage against enemy armor plates, along with improved range and recoil control. Though mobility and handling have taken a hit, they remain pretty close to baseline levels. This cements the Superi 46 as a great weapon to secure victory in both Rebirth Island and regular Warzone playlists.

  • Colossus Suppressor (Muzzle)
  • Houndguard Heavy Barrel (Barrel)
  • FTAC SP-10 Angled Grip (Underbarrel)
  • 4.6mm High Grain (Ammunition)
  • 40 Round Mag (Magazine)

Best Perk Package

  • Double Time - Boosts mobility by increasing the player's Tac Sprint duration. Great for players who like to run and gun with a Submachine Gun.
  • Sleight Of Hand - Provides the player with faster reload times, which is perfect for mitigating the speed reductions brought on by equipping a large magazine.
  • Quick Fix - Allows players to start their health regeneration much faster after killing opponents or replacing their armor plates. Perfect for gaining health faster during hectic gunfights.
  • Birdseye - A must-use perk for tracking down opponents by revealing the direction players are heading, along with revealing Ghosted players when UAVs are active.

Recommended Secondary

Though the Superi 46 will keep players covered in close-quarters gunfights in Warzone Battle Royale, it severely lacks the potential to gun down opponents from across range. With this being the case, players must consider running this nifty SMG as a close-range support weapon and pair it with another that can perform well in the long-range meta.

Some decent options in this regard include the DG-56 , the DG-58 LSW , the TAQ Eradicator , the Holger 26 , and the MCW 6.8 . Sniper Rifles are also a good consideration, with the two most viable options being the KATT-AMR and the XRK Stalker .

item.title: WoW Remix MoP: How To Farm Bronze
item.description:
Quick Links

  • The Best Ways To Farm For Bronze In WoW Remix: MoP
  • Ways To Farm Bronze That Have Been Nerfed Or Removed

World of Warcraft is currently having an event known as WoW Remix: Mists of Pandaria. This event allows players to take a trip back in time to when the Mists of Pandaria expansion was the current major expansion in the game.

While players are exploring Pandaria, they will need to obtain a currency known as Bronze if they want to be able to obtain some of the items that are exclusive to this specific event. Here are some of the best ways to farm Bronze.

The Best Ways To Farm For Bronze In WoW Remix: MoP

Farming for Bronze in the remix is pretty easy. Blizzard hasn't made it too difficult to obtain the currency; it is just a grind at some points. The best way to obtain Bronze is to just play the game. Players can obtain Bronze from certain Achievements (like gaining reputation with factions), quests that reward the Cache of Infinite Potential, Daily Quests, Raids, Dungeons, Scenarios, flying through the Bronze Orbs that are all around the game, and by killing enemies.

While players are working toward leveling their characters up, they will automatically obtain some amazing amounts of Bronze. The fastest way to level involves everything that does give players Bronze. For those looking for the best ways to obtain Bronze quickly, they should consider doing raids and dungeons though, as those will give players Bronze for killing enemies and for completing them. Additionally, some raids and dungeons will give players reputation, which can then help them achieve the achievements offering Bronze Caches as a reward. Overall, obtaining Bronze is pretty easy, and the dungeons and raids are probably players' best bets.

Ways To Farm Bronze That Have Been Nerfed Or Removed

Unfortunately, many of the amazing Bronze farming methods have either been nerfed or removed entirely. This does make getting Bronze more time-consuming, but it is still a relatively easy thing to do in the game. Some of these methods included:

  • The Frog Farm Method - Players were able to kill frogs on the Timeless Isle.
  • The Crane Farm Method - Players were killing Wildfeather Cranes on the Timeless Isle
  • The Goat Farm Method - Similar to the Frog Farm, players were able to kill goats in the Valley of the Four Winds.
  • The Bug Farm Method - The same as those above, players were killing Mantid mobs in Townlong Steppes.

All of these methods require hyperspawning, which is when players lure large numbers of enemies together and kill them one after another. Once killed, they would quickly respawn another one in their place, creating an endless supply of Bronze. Unfortunately, once Blizzard caught on to what players were doing, these were patched out. It is likely that if any new ones are found, they will be patched out as well.

item.title: CoD MW3 & Warzone: Best Kar98k Loadout
item.description:
Quick Links

  • How To Unlock The Kar98k
  • Best MW3 Kar98k Loadout
  • Best Warzone Kar98k Loadout

The highly anticipated Season 4 for Modern Warfare 3 and Warzone has made its debut, bringing a host of additional content to both games. From the addition of two 6v6 maps, Paris and Tokyo, to the arrival of Gulag variants and updates to the opening Urzikstan Bunkers, there is plenty for gamers to dive into. One of the most welcome additions, however, is the return of the fan-favorite Kar98k.

The Kar98k is a returning weapon for Modern Warfare 3 and Warzone , which made its initial debut in the original Call Of Duty but was widely popular in Modern Warfare 2019 . This Marksman Rifle, though not necessarily holding a candle to the KATT-AMR in terms of raw damage, is an excellent Sniper substitute because of its enhanced handling attributes. Here is the best loadout for the Kar98k in Modern Warfare 3 and Warzone .

How To Unlock The Kar98k

The Kar98k is one of three free weapon rewards tied to the Season 4 Battle Pass of Modern Warfare 3 and Warzone . To acquire it, players need to create a path to Sector 5 by unlocking all previous rewards within adjacent sectors. They must then claim all the rewards within Sector 5 using their earned Battle Pass Tokens to be able to claim the Kar98k. The fastest way to reach Sector 5 is to unlock all rewards in Sectors 1 and 3.

Once Season 4 is over, the Kar98k will then be made available as an Armory Unlock.

Best MW3 Kar98k Loadout

The following build for the Kar98k is made specifically for Modern Warfare 3 's Multiplayer mode. Running these particular set of attachments will boost range and handling considerably, cementing the Kar98k as a fast and reliable Marksman Rifle. Though accuracy and mobility have been reduced slightly, they do remain pretty close to baseline levels.

  • Sonic Suppressor L (Muzzle)
  • XTEN Phantom-5 Handstop (Underbarrel)
  • Corio Eagleseye 2.5x (Optic)
  • Repeller Tac Stock (Stock)
  • Target Sling (Sling)

Best Equipment

  • Assassin Vest (Vest) - Hides kill skulls from the enemy team along with making the player undetectable by UAVs and radar effects.
  • Quick-Grip Gloves (Gloves) - Provides a minimum weapon swap speed of 40%, great for quickly switching to Pistols.
  • Lightweight Boots (Boots) - Provides an increase in movement and swim speed, ideal for combating low mobility.
  • Mag Holster (Gear) - Increases the player's reload speed, minimizing the downtime experienced when needing to reload.

Recommended Secondary

Only the most accurate of players will be able to use the Kar98k in close-quarters combat, and a good Marksman Rifle calls for a reliable Secondary to swap to in tense situations. With that being the case, players should consider running a weapon from the Handgun category to go alongside the Kar98k. Some of the best Handgun options for Season 4 and beyond include the WSP Stinger , the Renetti , and the TYR .

Best Warzone Kar98k Loadout

The below Kar98k build is specifically targeted towards players diving into Warzone Battle Royal. Running these attachments provides a great increase in range, along with improved damage and accuracy. Although handling and mobility have been reduced, players will find the Kar98k to be quite effective at the 60-meter mark -- great for winning on Rebirth Island.

  • Sonic Suppressor L (Muzzle)
  • Prazisiongewehr 720 Long Barrel (Barrel)
  • 7.92 High Grain Rounds (Ammunition)
  • SP-X 80 6.6x (Optic)
  • Target Sling (Sling)

Best Perk Package

  • Focus - Reduces flinch during ADS, along with extending the Hold Breath duration. Perfect for maintaining accuracy with the Kar98k.
  • Double Time - Enhances the player's Tac Sprint duration, mitigating any drastic reductions in mobility to keep players quick on their feet.
  • Tempered - Replate armor vests to full with just two plates. Works great in quickly plating up after taking damage, allowing players to return fire much sooner.
  • Birdseye - Enhances radar effects such as UAVs and Portable Radars, along with bypassing Ghosted player's immunity to being revealed on the minimap -- great for surveying the battlefield for the next kill.

Recommended Secondary

The Kar98k is great for players looking to take down opponents across range but is not exactly a versatile weapon to handle all situations when it comes to Warzone Battle Royale. With this being the case, it is recommended that players run an additional Primary weapon from either the Assault Rifle or Submachine Gun categories.

For Assault Rifles, some of the top picks include the BP50 , the RAM-7 , and the Holger 556 . For Submachine Guns, opt for the Striker 9 , the WSP Swarm , the Rival-9 , or the FJX Horus .

item.title: Elden Ring: How To Counter Bleed
item.description:
Quick Links

  • How To Counter Bleed In Elden Ring
  • How To Resist Bleed In Elden Ring

Elden Ring has many deadly status effects that can quickly turn the tide of battle. Bleed is one of these status effects that can be applied by a wide range of enemies and weapons, letting players also utilize this deadly effect.

Once the build-up bar fills up, Blood Loss will immediately deal a percentage of damage against the target based on their max health. This makes Bleed an excellent tool when dealing with high HP enemies such as the Sleeping Dragon in Elden Ring . For those who have trouble with enemies utilizing Bleed, there are a few things that can prevent it from taking effect.

How To Counter Bleed In Elden Ring

Bleed can't be cured after it goes into effect like other status ailments, as the results are instant once the bar fills up. Players instead will have to focus on reducing the bar that builds up. This bar will naturally decline slowly every few seconds , but combat will require a faster method. Stanching Boluses can be crafted and used in combat to immediately clear most of a player's Bleed build-up.

Players can craft a Stanching Boluse after obtaining the Nomadic Warrior (7) on the eastern side of the outside of Stormveil Castle in Elden Ring . With this cookbook, players can craft Stanching Boluses with 1 Herba, 1 Cave Moss, and 1 Land Octopus Ovary . Players can also use the Incantation Bestial Constitution or Lord's Aid to alleviate any build-up.

How To Resist Bleed In Elden Ring


A player's resistance to Bleed is based on their Robustness stat, which is increased by leveling up Endurance . Robustness is also a major stat found on armor, with heavier armor offering much higher Robustness. A character's overall Robustness is determined by both their Endurance level and the Robustness total of all equipped armor. Increasing your Endurance increases the player's equipment load in Elden Ring ; and allows for heavier armor to be used more effectively, helping tankier builds worry about Bleed much less.

The Stalwart Horn Charm can be equipped to increase the player's total Robustness. Players can also temporarily increase their Robustness by crafting two items found in the Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook (2). This cookbook can be found very early in the game at the Church of Elleh by purchasing it from Merchant Kale.

Item Name

How To Craft

Invigorating Cured Meat

  • 3 Golden Rowa
  • 1 Sliver of Meat
  • 1 Crab Eggs
  • 1 Land Octopus Ovary

Invigorating White Cure Meat

  • 3 Golden Rowa
  • 1 Strip of White Flesh
  • 1 Crab Eggs
  • 1 Land Octopus Ovary
